page.title: 06CHILDRENS GAMES IN SHEERNESS
page.content: IN MY SPARE TIME I GO{SWIMMING}AND I ALSO GO TO{GYMNASTICS.}AT GYMNASTICS WE DO MANY THINGS.WE GO ON THE TRAMPOLINE AND WORK FOR BADGES.I ALSO GO TO {MAJORETTES.}I GO ON THURSDAYS AND WE LEARN OUR TEAM MARCH,OUR TEAM TWIRL AND DANCE.WE ENTER CARNIVALS AND COMPETITIONS. AT HOME I DO NOT WATCH T.V. MUCH. OUT SIDE WE PLAY{BULL DOG}WHICH IS A KIND OF 'HE' GAME,WITH THE REST OF THE CHILDREN IN OUR STREET.WE PLAY {ROUNDERS}TOO. THERE IS ONE OTHER GAME WE LIKE TO PLAY,THAT IS{MONKEY WRAP.}WE SWING ACROSS THE SWINGS OVER THE PARK AND IF WE FALL OFF WE LOSE ONE OF OUR TEN LIVES.
